//create a user name
$ git config --global user.name mehrahrishioo7

//create a user email
$ git config --global user.email "mehrahrishi93@gmail.com"

//create a .gitignore file
$ touch .gitignore

//initialize the git(it is hidden)
$ git init

//all content send to staging area(means we are not worried) or you can use(git add -A)
$ git add .(This is for all)

//create a snapshot after some changes your repository
$ git commit -m "Initial commit"
 
//check the status(ready to git repository)
$ git status

nothing to commit, working tree clean
